Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Regular referee activity for the following journals: Les Annales d’Economie et de Statistique, Asia-Pacific Journal of Risk and Insurance, The B.E. Journal of Economic Analysis & Policy, Economic Inquiry, The European Journal of Health Economics, FinanzArchiv/Public Finance Analysis Finnish Economic Papers, Games and Economic Behaviors, The Geneva Papers on Risk and Insurance, Health Economics, International Journal of Industrial Organization, International Journal of Health Care Finance and Economics, Journal of Economic Behavior & Organization, Journal of Economics and Management Strategy, Journal of Health Economics, Journal of Public Economics, Journal of Public Economic Theory, Journal of Risk and Insurance, Management Science, The Manchester School, Oxford Economic Papers, Pacific Economic Review, Portuguese Economic Journal Review of Law & Economics, Rivista di Politica Economica, Rivista Italiana degli Economisti, Politiche Sanitarie.
Member of the Editorial Board of the journal Risks, MDPI - Open Access Publishing (http://www.mdpi.com/journal/risks/editors).

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Invited seminars: University of Modena (2016), Universitat de Barcelona (2016), Gate Institute, University of Lyon II (2015), University of Milano Cattolica (2015 and 2002), Boston University (2014 and 2013), University of Bologna (2013, 2011, 2009, 2008, 2002, 2000, 1999), University of Verona (2013 and 2007), Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona (2012), University Federico II, Naples (2012), University of Milano Statale (2010), University of Brescia (2010 and 2002), University of Padova (2009 and2000), University of Cagliari (2008), Erasmus University Rotterdam (2004), GREMAQ, University of Marseille (2002), GREQAM, University of Aix en Provence (1999), Toulouse School of Economics (1998).

Participation at the following conferences and Workshops European Health Economics Workshop (2015, 2011, 2009, 2006, 2002), Jornadas de Economia Industrial (2015), European Economic Association Annual Congress (2014, 2012, 2008, 2000, 1999), Gruppo di Ricerca per l'Analisi delle Scelte Sociali meeting (2014, 2008, 2009, 2007) Conference of the International Society for New Institutional Economics (2013), Journées d’Economie Publique Luis-André Gérard Varret (2016, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2004), Market and Happiness Conference (Milano-Bicocca 2011), Seminar of the European Group of Risk and Insurance Economists (EGRIE 2011, 2008), Annual Conference of the European Association for Research in Industrial Economics (2010, 2005), Economics of Genetic Technologies Seminar (Office of Health Economics, London 2008), European Conferences on Health Economics (2008), Health Economics and the Pharmaceutical Industry (Toulouse School of Economics 2008), meetings of the Association of Southern European Economic Theorists (2007, 2001, 1998), International Conference of the Foundations and Applications of Utility, Risk and Decision Theory (2006), "Associazione Italiana di Economia Sanitaria" meeting (2006, 2000), Annual Public Economic Theory Meetings (2005), Conference.in tribute to Jean-Jacques Laffont (Toulouse School of Economics 2005), "Società Italiana di Economia Pubblica" meeting (Pavia 2010, 2008, 2006, 2004, 2002, 2001), European Annual Meeting of the Econometric Society (2002), International Health Economics Conference (2001).
Organizer for the series of lunch seminars and regular seminars, Department of Economics, University of Bologna.

Invited discussant at the following workshops and conferences: - 17th European Health Economics Workshop, organized by prof. Mathias Kifmann and hosted by University of Hamburg, May 2016. - “the Economics of Long-Term Care”, organized by prof. Helmuth Cremer and hosted by Venice Summer Institutes, San Servolo, Venice 2012. - “Regulation of media markets”, organized by prof. Paul Seabright and hosted by Toulouse School of Economics 2004.
Organizer of the workshop “Managing Health Information”, 2006, Scuola Superiore di Politiche per la Salute and Department of Economics, University of Bologna.
2007: co-organizer of the “5th Workshop on Media Economics”, Department of Economics, University of Bologna.
Co-organizer of the conference GRASS (Gruppo di Ricerca per l’Analisi delle Scelte Sociali) 2008, hosted by the Department of Economics, University of Bologna.
Invited speaker at the workshop on “The economics of personalized medicine”, organized by prof. Pau Olivella, Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona 2012.
Invited speaker at the workshop "Prosocial Motivation at Work", organized by prof. Robert Dur, Rotterdam Erasmus School of Economics, December 2-3, 2016.

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Research grant awarded by Scuola Superiore di Politiche della Salute (University of Bologna) for the project: "Managing Health Information: an analysis of health information campaigns" (2005-2007).

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Scholarship for International Master Programs (for the admission to the Master Program in Economics at Toulouse School of Economics), University of Bologna.

1998: Master in Advanced Economics, DEEQA (Diplôme Européen d’Economie Quantitative Approfondie), Toulouse School of Economics. 1995: Master D.E.A. (Diplome d’Etudes Approfondies) in “Economic Theory”Toulouse School of Economics.

ATTENZIONE: questo non è un premio ma lo schema della domanda non mi permette di inserire questa informazione in altro modo. Durante il PhD presso Toulouse School of Economics ho avuto due figlie nate rispettivamente il 9 maggio 1996 e il 30 gennaio 2000. Nelle date riporto indicativamente un periodo di 5 mesi come se fosse un congedo di maternità per la prima figlia. Ricordo inoltre che il terzo figlio è nato il 25 gennaio 2003. Solo per il terzo figlio ho potuto indicare il periodo di congedo per maternità nell'apposito spazio dedicato alle mie informazioni personali.

ATTENZIONE: questo non è un premio ma lo schema della domanda non mi permette di inserire questa informazione in altro modo. Durante il PhD presso Toulouse School of Economics ho avuto due figlie nate rispettivamente il 9 maggio 1996 e il 30 gennaio 2000. Nelle date riporto indicativamente un periodo di 5 mesi come se fosse un congedo di maternità per la seconda figlia. Ricordo inoltre che il terzo figlio è nato il 25 gennaio 2003. Solo per il terzo figlio ho potuto indicare il periodo di congedo per maternità nell'apposito spazio dedicato alle mie informazioni personali.
PhD in Economics received from Toulouse School of Economics July 7, 2000: “Mention très honorable et felicitations du jury”
Assegno di ricerca biennale presso il Dipartimento di Scienze Economiche, Università di Bologna
The paper "Assicurazione Sanitaria" has been invited by the Editorial Board of Rivista di Politica Economica in 2006 for the journal section "Parole Chiave".
Reviewer for the National Science Foundation (NSF USA).

External examiner for the Ph.D. thesis "Tension in New Zealand's public hospitals: performance effects of sharpening incentives", School of Economics and Finance, Victoria University of Wellington, New Zealand, 2011
Member of the Program Committee for the annual AFSE (Association Française de Science Economique) conference 2012.
Member of the Scientific Committee of the 17th European Health Economics Workshop (University of Hamburg, 2016)

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Courses for the PhD in Economics, Department of Economics, University of Bologna (in English) - “Behavioral Decision-Making”, from a.y. 2011/12 to a.y. 2012/13. - “Topics on Information Economics”, from a.y. 2008/09 to a.y. 2009/10. - “Contract Theory” from a.y. 2003/04 to a.y. 2006/07.
Membro del collegio dei docenti del dottorato in Sanità Pubblica e Medicina del Lavoro dell'Università di Bologna.
Supervisor of PhD students: Dr Viki Nellas (PhD defence in 2010), Dr Eleftheria Triviza (PhD defence in 2016).

Winter School on Inequality and Social Welfare Theory, organized by the Dep. of Economics, University of Verona, for PhD students. Title of the course: “Health Insurance and Redistribution”, January 2007.
Membro del collegio dei docenti del dottorato in Economia dell'Università di Bologna a partire dal XXXIV ciclo, anno accademico 2008/9.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: “Health Insurance”, February 1999, Master in "Economie de l'assurance", Toulouse School of Economics (tought in French).
Course “Topics on Health Insurance”, Master in Finance and Insurance, February 2011, Ecole Centrale Marseille (tought in English).
“Microeconomics 201” (intermediate Microeconomics), a.y.2013/14, Boston University, tought in English.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Visiting Toulouse School of Economics from September 1996 to September 1998. Research title: "In-kind Transfers as an instrument for redistribution". Funded by the European commission under the program TMR (Trade and mobility of researchers), contract number ERBFN950278

Research activities with the following coauthors from foreign universties: - Renaud Bourlès (Ecole Centrale Marseille) - Helmuth Cremer (Toulouse School of Economics) - Dominique Henriet (Ecole Centrale Marseille) - Albert Ma (Boston Universty) - Martin Peitz (University of Mannheim) - Kerstin Roeder (University of Augsburg) - Bertrand Villeneuve (University Paris-Dauphine)
Scholarship from the Toulouse School of Economics for Ph.D. students.
Member of the Research Project 2007R5PN7Y_001 (PRIN 2007) "Analisi Teorica dei Mercati a due Versanti: Politiche della Concorrenza, Regolamentazione ed Innovazione".
Visiting Professor Ecole Centrale Marseille, February 2011, invited by prof. Dominique Henriet.
Visiting professor at Boston University, academic year 2013/2014, invited by Prof. Albert Ma.
Visiting professor at Toulouse School of Economics, September 2016, invited by prof. Helmuth Cremer
